feed.title: Significant losses by double-spending unconfirmed transactions

entry.title: Significant losses by double-spending unconfirmed transactions
entry.summary: The discussion is about the relay drop rules in Bitcoin XT. The patches were written by Gavin and Tom, but included in Bitcoin XT's GitHub repository. The README section of the repository contains information on the relaying of double spends and the pre- and post-Hearn-relay drop rules that are being referred to.
